summary: A small spell/equipment pack that helps bring mages into line to compete with warriors and rogues.  It includes:  Bound Pickaxe (summonable pickaxe) spell, Face Change spell, Unburden (increase carrying capacity) spell, Gauntlets of Destruction, Boots of Speed, Hood of Efficient Mana, and a Free Trade (confers the Merchant Perk) spell.
descriptionHtml:
Plym's Spell Pack

While attempting to play a destruction mage at various points in the game, I was constantly disappointed at my firepower and mana.  Warriors and Rogues can scale their damage up with enchantments and blacksmithing, to say nothing of increasing their skill and perks.  Mages get a handful of spells that they basically have to re-learn constantly, and that never get any better, all the while juggling mana demands.

This spell pack aims to help solve that with a few simple items and spells.

Gauntlets of Destruction - your damage from your weenie flame spell (which is all but useless by level 6), gets a bit of a boost.  What's more, their enchantment can be learned, meaning you can create more powerful gauntlets of destruction as you increase your enchanting skill.

Boots of Speed - Skyrim is a lovely land.  It would be great to see it while your still young.  These boots increase your movement speed by a small amount, and help make running long distances less of an onerous task, and more of a joyful romp!

Hood of Efficient Mana - Don't you hate running out of mana just as you're about to finally gun down that Dragon Priest with
author: Plymster
